idea:
Electrogenis Solutions LLP also known as EGS is a pioneer in designing innovative analytical and measuring instruments for metallurgical industry. All our products are designed to provide accuracy and speed. We manufacture various temperature sensors and are also engaged in providing customized technological solutions for the industry to increase productivity without compromising quality.

EGS aims to deliver the most competitive quality products coupled with prompt services to ensure customer satisfaction.
name: ELECTROGENIS SOLUTIONS LLP

idea: Energy is major driver of our social and economic growth, but it is also major culprit of climate change. In the context of energy access, energy sustainability, and climate change, Energy Swaraj is conceptualized to be a way of generating and fulfilling all our energy needs locally, using locally available resources. Energy Swaraj Foundation is a not-for-profit organization that is founded to establish Energy Swaraj, everywhere in the world.
name: Energy Swaraj Foundation

idea:
DeCore Perspective focuses on end to end Interior Design, specialized in Second Home Interior Designing apart from excelling in the sphere of Turnkey Projects, Cafes, Resorts, Residences, Villas/Bungalows from design, Architecture to complete end to end execution starting at ground zero. We are the pioneers in terms of what we’ve been doing in the Second Home Interior Designing industry- A niche that has never been significantly explored in India, and we feel privileged to be the trailblazers and at the same time carry the responsibility of being a class apart for the years to come. We take the hassle out of your hands, overseeing the project from the beginning to the end.

You don’t have to carry the burden of procuring materials, handling workers and vendors which is usually the main fix with residential projects, boutique hotels, retail stores, commercial projects, cafes and second homes/ holiday homes. We’ll be there for you through this, too. And we work with some of the best people in the business which allows us to ensure that we have the right people for the job and that quality is paramount throughout the project. We pay sharp attention to detail, including the smallest ones and add a tinge of luxury and leisure to turn your space from mediocre to magnificent. 

We take the hassle out of your hands, overseeing the project from the beginning to the end.
name: La Decore Perspective
